Package io.github.pitzzahh.atm.database

Class DatabaseConnection

java.lang.Object
io.github.pitzzahh.atm.database.DatabaseConnection
public class DatabaseConnection extends Object
Interface used by services to gain access to the database.

    • setDriverClassName

      public DatabaseConnection setDriverClassName(String driverClassName)
      Sets the driver class name.

      Examples:

      postgres: org.postgresql.Driver

      mysql: com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver

      Parameters:
      driverClassName - the driver class name
      Returns:
      a DatabaseConnection object.
      See Also:
      • Driver

    • setUrl

      public DatabaseConnection setUrl(String url)
      Sets the url of the database.

      Examples:

      postgres: jdbc:postgresql://localhost/<name of the database>

      mysql: jdbc:mysql://host1:33060/<name of the database>

      Parameters:
      url - the url to the database.
      Returns:
      a DatabaseConnection object.
      See Also:
      • Driver

      Returns:
      a DatabaseConnection object.
